item.title: 白宫下令后印度俄罗斯原油进口量预计减半
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在特朗普总统发布命令详细说明美俄贸易协议部分条款后，印度从俄罗斯进口的石油量可能从近期已然疲软的水平进一步减少近半。【原文：India’s imports of Russian oil could almost halve from already weaker recent levels, according to people with direct knowledge of the purchases, after US President Donald Trump issued an order detailing some terms of a trade deal between the two nations.】

item.title: 南非农产品出口创历史新高，而美国出口量却暴跌
item.description: 2025年南非农产品出口额创下151亿美元的年度纪录，尽管下半年对美国的出口量大幅下滑。【原文：South African agricultural exports hit an annual record of $15.1 billion in 2025, even as shipments to the US slumped in the second half of the year.】

item.title: 阿波罗与施罗德联手向高净值投资者销售基金
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司正与施罗德集团携手开发面向财富管理及养老金客户的基金产品。双方预期通过此次战略合作，最终将实现每年数十亿美元的资产募集规模。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is teaming up with Schroders Plc to develop funds for wealth and pension clients, in a strategic partnership the firms expect to ultimately raise billions of dollars in assets per year.】

item.title: Advent与联邦快递牵头的财团将以78亿欧元估值收购InPost
item.description: 由私募股权公司Advent International LP和联邦快递公司牵头的投资者集团，已同意以78亿欧元（约合93亿美元）收购波兰智能包裹柜公司InPost SA。【原文：Investors led by buyout firm Advent International LP and FedEx Corp. agreed to buy Polish parcel-locker company InPost SA in a deal that values the business at €7.8 billion ($9.3 billion).】

item.title: 中国银行间借贷热潮预示债券杠杆率上升
item.description: 中国低利率环境正推动银行间借贷激增，金融机构正利用低成本资金购买债券。【原文：China’s low-interest rate environment is driving a surge in interbank borrowing, as financial institutions take advantage of cheap funding to buy bonds.】

item.title: 富时100指数有望上涨，英镑保持稳定
市场对高市幸子持保留态度，日股与日元双双走高
item.description: 投资者对日本选举结果的反应表明，首相高市早苗至少暂时摆脱了市场动荡的困扰——此前市场动荡曾威胁到她的支出计划。【原文：Investor reaction to Japan’s election signals at least a temporary reprieve for Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi from market ructions that have threatened to undermine her spending plans.】

item.title: 美国国债下跌，因有消息称中国银行被要求限制持有美国国债
item.description: 据报道，中国监管机构要求国内金融机构控制其持有的美国国债，美国国债价格延续跌势。【原文：Treasuries extended losses after Chinese regulators reportedly asked the nation’s financial institutions to rein in their holdings of US bonds.】

item.title: 帝斯曼与CVC资本达成协议，出售动物保健业务
item.description: DSM-Firmenich AG同意将其动物营养与健康业务出售给CVC资本合伙公司，企业价值约为22亿欧元（26亿美元）。【原文：DSM-Firmenich AG agreed to sell its animal nutrition and health business to CVC Capital Partners for an enterprise value of about €2.2 billion ($2.6 billion).】

item.title: 裕信银行将在五年内向投资者返还500亿欧元
item.description: 裕信银行计划在2030年前向投资者返还约500亿欧元（590亿美元），首席执行官安德烈亚·奥塞尔承诺未来五年将进一步提升盈利能力和资本生成能力。【原文：UniCredit SpA plans to return about €50 billion ($59 billion) to investors through 2030 as Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel vows to further improve profitability and capital generation over the next five years.】

item.title: 中国敦促银行控制美国国债敞口
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国监管机构已建议金融机构控制其持有的美国国债规模，理由是担心集中风险和市场波动。【原文：Chinese regulators have advised financial institutions to rein in their holdings of US Treasuries, citing concerns over concentration risks and market volatility, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国股市因现任总理阿努廷意外胜选而大涨
item.description: 斯泰康集团股价领涨与泰国现任总理阿努廷·查伦比拉库尔相关的公司，此前其政党在周日选举中意外赢得最多席位。【原文：Stecon Group Pcl shares led a rally in companies tied to incumbent Thai Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul after his party unexpectedly won the most seats in Sunday’s election.】

item.title: 孟加拉国在国家大选前维持关键利率不变
item.description: 孟加拉国央行周一宣布维持基准利率10%不变，此举是在本周全国大选前夕作出的，央行表示该南亚国家持续面临高通胀压力。【原文：Bangladesh’s central bank kept its main policy rate unchanged at 10% on Monday ahead of national elections this week, citing persistent high inflation in the South Asian country.】

item.title: 日本最大核电站经历短暂停机后二度重启
item.description: 日本东京电力公司重启了全球最大核电站的一座反应堆，此前因上月出现问题导致重启进程延迟。【原文：Japanese utility Tokyo Electric Power Co. restarted a reactor at the world’s biggest nuclear power plant, after an issue last month delayed the process.】

item.title: 伦敦股票正离开它们曾经蜂拥而至的增长型市场
item.description: 2005年，Young & Co.酿酒公司成为首批40家将股票从伦敦证券交易所主板市场转至成长板块的企业之一。这家拥有近200年历史的酒吧连锁企业被该小型交易所的税收优惠政策所吸引，并看中了其"日益增长的成功与人气"。【原文：In 2005, Young & Co.’s Brewery Plc was one of 40 companies to transfer its shares from the London Stock Exchange’s main market to its growth segment. The nearly 200-year-old pub chain was attracted by the smaller exchange’s tax incentives, “growing success and popularity.”】

item.title: 印度同意降低对美国大豆供应的关税，豆油价格上涨
item.description: 芝加哥大豆油价格升至逾六个月高点，因市场预期印度在提议开放部分农业市场以进口更便宜的美国农产品后，将增加采购量。【原文：Chicago soybean oil rose to its highest level in more than six months, driven by hopes that India will buy more after proposing to open parts of its agriculture market to cheaper US imports.】

item.title: 菲律宾副总统杜特尔特本月面临第三次弹劾动议
item.description: 菲律宾副总统萨拉·杜特尔特本月面临第三次弹劾指控，其政治对手正重启将其罢免的努力。【原文：Philippines Vice President Sara Duterte is facing her third impeachment complaint this month as political opponents revive efforts to remove her from office.】

item.title: 沙特监管机构面临审查IPO本土化举措的呼声
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯市场监管机构正面临压力，要求其重新考虑扩大本地散户投资者在首次公开募股中份额的举措，因外界担忧此举可能进一步削弱上市表现。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s markets regulator is being urged to rethink its push to give local retail investors a larger share of initial public offerings, amid concerns the effort risks further weakening listing performance.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚财政部长视控制预算为"国家项目"
item.description: 罗马尼亚财政部长表示，通过削减该国过高的预算赤字来重获投资者信心，应当成为一项"国家项目"，因为政府正努力夺回对财政政策的控制权。【原文：Romania’s finance chief said winning back investor confidence by trimming the nation’s outsized budget deficit should amount to a “national project” as the government struggles to wrest control over fiscal policy.】

item.title: 日本防卫类股因高市早苗的国家安全计划而大涨
item.description: 日本防卫类股周一大幅上涨，因首相高市早苗取得历史性选举胜利，投资者预期她推动加强日本防卫能力的举措将加速推进。【原文：Japan’s defense stocks surged on Monday after Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s historic election victory raised investor expectations that her drive to strengthen Japan’s defense capabilities will accelerate.】

item.title: 对冲基金增持澳元多头头寸，因澳联储持续收紧政策
item.description: 杠杆资金管理公司将澳元看涨押注提升至逾八年最高水平，押注债券收益率预期上升将缓冲短期波动。【原文：Leveraged money managers lifted their bullish bets on the Australian dollar to the highest level in over eight years, wagering that projected gains in bond yields will cushion near-term volatility.】

item.title: 字节跳动新型视频模式点燃中国AI应用股涨势
item.description: 字节跳动公司最新推出的视频生成模型因其卓越的内容创作质量赢得分析师青睐，推动中国媒体及人工智能应用企业股价上涨。【原文：ByteDance Ltd.’s latest video generation model triggered gains in shares of Chinese media and artificial-intelligence application firms, after impressing analysts with the quality of content creation.】

item.title: 全球资金涌入印尼债券，时机却恰恰不对
item.description: 全球投资者在印尼债券市场转向不利于他们之前蜂拥而入。【原文：Global investors swarmed into Indonesian debt just before the market turned against them.】

item.title: 印度企业盈利状况备受关注，美印贸易协议重塑赢家与输家格局
item.description: 鞋类、服装、珠宝、航空航天及汽车零部件企业被视为关税下调的主要受益者。【原文：Footwear, apparel, jewelry, aerospace and auto parts firms seen as key beneficiaries of lower tariffs.】

item.title: 中国铜需求将趋缓，因买家延长假期停工
item.description: 中国铜买家延长了春节假期，因铜价逼近历史高位，导致工业需求降温。【原文：Chinese copper buyers are extending their break over the Lunar New Year as near-record prices chill industrial demand for the metal.】

item.title: 中国数字出口激增，阿里巴巴、腾讯引领全球扩张
item.description: 随着字节跳动、腾讯控股等科技巨头在直播、电商和人工智能领域加速海外扩张，中国企业海外数字服务收入正呈现爆发式增长。【原文：Chinese revenue from digital services sold abroad is soaring as tech champions from ByteDance Ltd. to Tencent Holdings Ltd. ramp up their overseas push in live streaming, e-commerce and artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 美国天然气价格因天气转暖预期延续跌势
item.description: 美国天然气价格连续第二个交易日下跌，原因是预计全国大部分地区气温将回升，这可能削减用于供暖和发电的燃料需求。【原文：US natural gas dropped for a second session on the outlook for warmer temperatures across large parts of the country, which is likely to trim demand for the fuel used for heating and power generation.】

item.title: 特朗普政府将就纽约-新泽西隧道资金问题上诉法院裁决
item.description: 特朗普政府计划对一项临时法庭命令提出上诉，该命令阻止联邦政府扣留用于哈德逊河下160亿美元铁路隧道的资金。【原文：The Trump administration plans to appeal a temporary court order that blocks the federal government from withholding funds for a $16 billion rail tunnel under the Hudson River.】

item.title: 黑石、Coatue向澳大利亚人工智能公司提供100亿美元贷款
item.description: 由黑石集团牵头的基金与科技投资公司Coatue Capital LLC正提供100亿美元贷款，支持澳大利亚初创企业Firmus Technologies Pty的数据中心部署，此举成为该国规模最大的私募信贷融资之一。【原文：Blackstone Inc.-led funds and technology investment firm Coatue Capital LLC are providing a $10 billion loan to back the data center rollout of Australian startup Firmus Technologies Pty., in one of the country’s largest private credit financings.】

item.title: 日本外相高市早苗胜选后，日本外汇主管称正密切关注市场动向
item.description: 日本货币事务最高官员表示，在首相高市早苗于周日提前大选中取得历史性胜利后，日元汇率再度承压，政府正密切监控外汇市场，保持高度警惕。【原文：Japan’s top currency official said the government remains on high alert as it monitors the foreign exchange market after the yen initially came under renewed pressure following Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s historic victory in Sunday’s snap election.】
